title: House for Sale in Nawala
details:
Highlights
- Land extent: 14.5 Perches
- Property is located on a residential lane off Nawala Road.
- Approx. 30 meters away from Nawala Road.
- Approx. 150 meters from the Nawala Junction [Cargills Food City].
- Approx. 18 year old, two story house currently resides on the property.
- The property is accessible via a 12-15 foot wide access road.

House Details
- Three bedroom, three bathroom, 2500 square foot house with large garden.
- Spacious down stair living & dining area.
- Recently renovated house.
- Certificate of Conformity (CoC) available.
- Clear title.

Price negotiable upon inspection.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
